name: Sky Wings Aviation Academy
about: Sky Wings Aviation Academy, located at the Red Deer Regional Airport in Alberta, Canada, has been a cornerstone of aviation education since 1982. We offer a comprehensive Aviation Diploma Program in collaboration with Red Deer Polytechnic, combining flight training with business and managerial skills. Our programs include Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and other advanced certifications. With state-of-the-art facilities, including Cessna 172s and a Twin Engine Piper Seneca, and an ALSIM 200 Flight Simulator, we provide optimal learning environments. Our experienced instructors and commitment to safety and excellence have enabled our students to secure positions with major airlines worldwide. We are dedicated to shaping the future of aviation by nurturing talent and upholding the highest standards of safety and excellence. Join us to embark on a rewarding career in aviation.
